title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Language Proficiency Improvement Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Focus on analyzing learners' language usage patterns and providing personalized feedback in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their own language usage data collected via mobile platforms to identify three personal weaknesses.
Learners can establish and execute personalized language practice plans at least twice weekly based on analysis results.
Learners can demonstrate at least a 20% improvement in language proficiency (pre-post comparison) through project-based assessment at the end of the six-month course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
